sections.heading: Repealed.Section 46-2-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:1941 Comp., § 36-301, enacted by Laws 1951, ch. 193, § 1; 1953 Comp., § 33-3-1; Laws 1965, ch. 27, § 1; 1995, ch. 190, § 1; repealed by Laws 2003, ch. 122, § 11-1105.

Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 122, § 11-1105 repealed 46-2-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1951, ch. 193, § 1, relating to definitions, effective July 1, 2003. For provisions of former section,seethe 2002 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present similar provisions,seeChapter 46A.
